title: Woman indicted in local child’s shooting death
content:
KILLEEN, Texas (KWTX) A woman accused of firing a shot at another woman during an argument was indicted Wednesday for killing a child the victim was holding.
Shayla Cyreice Dearinge, 26, was named in an indictment charging her with murder in the November shooting death of Jayden Brown, 2, as his mother was holding the boy during an argument between Natsha Jeter and Dearinge.
An affidavit issued in the case says Jeter had turned to walk out the door when she heard a gun cock and she heard is discharge.
When police arrived Dearinge told officers the shooting was accidental.
